医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
COVID-19 患者侵袭性肺部真菌感染的发病率和危险因素研究显示，重症患者中与 COVID-19 相关的肺曲霉病的发病率为 0.4%-2.7%，凸显了显着的死亡风险和危险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Incidence-and-risk-factors-of-an-pressive-fungal-lung-infection-among-COVID-19-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Incidence-and-risk-factors-of-an-pressive-fungal-lung-infection-among-COVID-19-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=850630f8-dd6d-4df2-8ca1-568564435c3b Tue, 24 Sep 2024 06:15:00 -0400 Incidence and risk factors of an invasive fungal lung infection among COVID-19 patients
在狼疮和 IBD 中鉴定的微生物生物标志物为靶向治疗提供了途径研究将肠道微生物群与狼疮和炎症性肠病联系起来，揭示了微生物标记物和途径，可以为自身免疫性疾病的靶向治疗提供信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Microbial-biomarkers-identified-in-lupus-and-IBD-offer-pathways-for-targeted-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Microbial-biomarkers-identified-in-lupus-and-IBD-offer-pathways-for-targeted-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a4dde175-2ed4-40cf-9e2a-600e89905c24 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 05:17:00 -0400 Microbial biomarkers identified in lupus and IBD offer pathways for targeted therapies
由于排放量增加，预计到 2065 年美国极端温度死亡人数将激增预计到 2065 年，美国与气温相关的严重死亡率将大幅上升，因此需要对高危人群采取集中干预措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Extreme-Temperature-deaths-expected-to-surge-in-US-by-2065-due-to-rising-emissions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Extreme-Temperature-deaths-expected-to-surge-in-US-by-2065-due-to-rising-emissions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fac7a31f-4b46-4217-9948-60099a924de​​2 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 04:41:00 -0400 Extreme temperature deaths expected to surge in US by 2065 due to rising emissions
已知基因导致大多数未确诊的发育障碍病例科学家们对隐性基因变化如何导致发育障碍进行了迄今为止规模最大、最多样化的研究。他们发现，大多数因隐性原因而导致的未确诊病例与我们已知的基因有关，这表明研究重点的转变可以提高诊断率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Known-genes-account-for-most-undiagnosed-cases-of-developmental-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Known-genes-account-for-most-undiagnosed-cases-of-developmental-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3640158e-e125-4e5c-9cf0-a9b08f3ce476 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 02:10:00 -0400 Known genes account for most undiagnosed cases of developmental disorders
研究揭示炎症免疫细胞如何增强前列腺癌抵抗力与前列腺癌和许多其他癌症相关的挑战是，随着疾病的进展，癌细胞会对治疗产生耐药性。然而，这些耐药机制尚未完全了解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Study-reveals-how-炎症-immune-cells-enhance-prostate-cancer-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Study-reveals-how-炎症-immune-cells-enhance-prostate-cancer-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be91d1fb-9e10-4802-8fa7-ab1e291f485c Tue, 24 Sep 2024 02:08:00 -0400 Study reveals how inflammatory immune cells enhance prostate cancer resistance
通过材料创新推进英国医疗保健生物电子学的新路线图亨利·莱斯研究所发布了《医疗保健领域生物电子材料战略和行动计划》一份综合报告，旨在通过材料创新帮助英国医疗保健领域的生物电子技术面向未来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/New-roadmap-to-advance-UKe28099s-bio electronics-for-healthcare-through-materials-innovation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/New-roadmap-to-advance-UKe28099s-bio electronics-for-healthcare-through-materials-innovation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1f0253c-42f2-42df-99ad-a9b1eca31ea7 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 02:05:00 -0400 New roadmap to advance UK’s bioelectronics for healthcare through materials innovation
开创性项目旨在阐明帕金森氏症的复杂性Landmark 今天启动，是一项开创性的为期三年的研究计划，旨在以前所未有的细节了解帕金森氏症。该项目首次汇集了英国帕金森氏症协会、伦敦帝国理工学院、葛兰素史克、诺华、罗氏和 UCB 的力量，并得到了盖茨比慈善基金会 400 万英镑的创办捐款的支持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Groundwriting-project-seeks-to-Illuminate-the-complexities-of-Parkinsons.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Groundwriting-project-seeks-to-Illuminate-the-complexities-of-Parkinsons.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49288d05-ffb1-47a8-b0d2-f097c2958633 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 02:00:00 -0400 Groundbreaking project seeks to illuminate the complexities of Parkinson's
FIRS 敦促全球领导人应对空气污染和肺部疾病每年有 700 万人死于与空气污染相关的疾病，如慢性阻塞性肺病、肺癌和呼吸道感染。国际呼吸学会论坛 (FIRS) 呼吁全球领导人加大力度应对空气污染，空气污染是全球肺部疾病和死亡的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/FIRS-urges-global-leaders-to-combat-air-pollution-and-lung-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/FIRS-urges-global-leaders-to-combat-air-pollution-and-lung-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2a813ab-e052-4e03-8997-8700bd5d9159 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 01:57:00 -0400 FIRS urges global leaders to combat air pollution and lung disease
新的人工智能方法增强了心血管风险评估风险计算器用于评估数百万患者的疾病风险，其准确性至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/New-AI-approach-enhances-cardioangio-risk-assessment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/New-AI-approach-enhances-cardioangio-risk-assessment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f395858-d3ed-4bcf-a7b8-2857a6ca0b41 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 01:46:00 -0400 New AI approach enhances cardiovascular risk assessment
缺乏认识导致药物不良反应漏报一项新的调查发现，大约 75% 的澳大利亚人曾对药物产生过不良反应，但只有不到一半的人向医生或治疗产品管理局 (TGA) 报告过这种情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Lack-of-awareness-contributes-to-under-reporting-of-adverse-drug-reactions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Lack-of-awareness-contributes-to-under-reporting-of-adverse-drug-reactions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16e0932f-2e91-4e4c-b82b-594e6f767d28 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 01:38:00 -0400 Lack of awareness contributes to under-reporting of adverse drug reactions
